item.name: Toy Truck
item.description: One of a kind toy truck made of several types of hardwood. It is 4 inches wide, 14 inches long and 5 and a half inches tall.

item.name: Dart Board Case
item.description: A dart board case made with an oak exterior and birch interior and is 29 inches wide by 27 inches in height. Customizations can be designed into it to fit that perfect space, including a score board, dart holder and even your favorite theme tiles on the outside of the doors.

item.name: Adirondack Chair
item.description: This miniature version Adirondack chair is made from cedar and is perfect for that special stuffed toy for your child. Shown a third the size of a standard chair.

item.name: Rocking Horse
item.description: This childs rocking horse is carved from pine and stands 52 inches long by 31 inches high. Be it a girl or a boy, children will love to play with their own horse for hours. The bridle and saddle are made from leather and can be customized to your style. Other saddles are available but not shown.

item.name: Pool Cue & Ball Rack
item.description: The accessories of a pool table always take up too much room, but not with this pool cue and ball rack. All of the equipment is contained in a neat design that can be customized to fit your space.

item.name: Pine Childrens Step Stool
item.description: This small step stool is perfect for your child to allow them to reach that favorite toy or stuffed animal.
